name: Lasercat JUMP
description:
Play as a robot cat, dodge lasers and uh win. 

Feel free to share your speedrun times in the comments down below.
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1AY825u8rlRy8lUigPZ6ZgEbBUe22kpBtCEJgs99gXLU/edit?usp=sharing

ESC or select (controller) to pause!
